com.sterlingcommerce.baseutil.log

Class SCILogFactoryService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sterlingcommerce.baseutil.log.SCILogFactoryService

  • public class SCILogFactoryService
extends java.lang.Object
    The SCILogFactoryService provides a means of getting to an implentation of ISCILogFactory. Default behavior is to return a YFCLogCategoryFactory when the getLogFactory method is invoked. This behavior can be overridden by calling the setLogFactory method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static SCILogFactoryService getInstance() 
      ISCILogFactory getLogFactory()
      The SCILogFactoryService provides a getLogFactory method that returns an implementation of the ISCILogFactory interface.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void setLogFactory(java.lang.String className)
      The SCILogFactoryService supports injection of a Factory via the setLogFactory method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SCILogFactoryService getInstance()
        Returns:
        the singleton instance

      • setLogFactory

        public void setLogFactory(java.lang.String className)
        The SCILogFactoryService supports injection of a Factory via the setLogFactory method. If the method has been called, subsequent calls to the service will return the type that was last injected.
        Parameters:
        className - - the name of a class that implements the ISCILogFactory interface.

      • getLogFactory

        public ISCILogFactory getLogFactory()
        The SCILogFactoryService provides a getLogFactory method that returns an implementation of the ISCILogFactory interface. If the setLogFactory method has been called, the implementation passed to the method call is used. Otherwise, the SCILogFactoryService defaults to returning a YFCLogCategoryFactory.
        Returns:
        an implementation of ISCILogFactory interface

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
